name: The Feerrott
description: This dark and dangerous jungle is home to the large lizardman tribes, as well as the fearful temple of Cazic Thule.

npcs.name: Elvann Livshire
utterances: My head... the hum... make the hum stop...

npcs.name: Keevan Fastmarch
utterances: Hail to you too.  Are you lost?

npcs.name: Merchant Klobruk Pulp
utterances: Wares and goods, all you see is for sale.

npcs.name: Merchant Murgina
utterances: Don't listen to old Klobruk, I have what you need.

npcs.name: Verita N'miiel
utterances: Don't you have anything better to do right now?
